comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: As of the 8 October 2009 issue of Chai Lights, Libby and Julian Adler were still alive and active members of the Congregation Beth Israel in Hartford. Libby appears in a documentary, "Pride, Honor, and Courage: Jewish Women remember World War II." www.cbict.org/archives/chaiLights/091008.html
